---
title: "Hanna Kurovska"
---


Hanna Kurovska is a PhD student in Sociology, focused on sociology of science and sociology of education and a data practitioner in humanitarian domain.

### Education

-   NTUU "Igor Sikorskiy Kyiv Politechnic Institute" M.A. in Sociology

-   NTUU "Igor Sikorskiy Kyiv Politechnic Institute" B.A. in Sociology

-   Kyiv National University of Trade and Economy B.A. in Marketing

## Experience

-   July 2021  - present : Database Officer, IMPACT Initiatives
-   October 2020 - June 2021 : Database Assistant, Impact Initiatives
-   July 2018 - October 2020 : Analyst/Database operator/Documentator, East-Ukrainian Center for Civic Initiatives
